mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Book (ID, TITLE, IMG, AUTHOR, ISBN, PUBLISHER, publication_date, INTRO, PRICE, PAGE) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{img}, #{author}, #{isbn}, #{publisher}, #{publicationDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intro}, #{price}, #{page})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET TITLE=#{title}, IMG=#{img}, AUTHOR=#{author}, ISBN=#{isbn}, PUBLISHER=#{publisher}, PUBLICATION_DATE = #{publicationDate}, INTRO = #{intro}, PRICE=#{price}, PAGE=#{page} WHERE ID = #{id}
